NEW KIND OF PREDICTION MARKET

Decentralize Prediction Market

Tronel is a decentralized prediction market on the Tron platform that allows users to predict and gamble on the price of cryptocurrencies with each other in a direct and simple way.

Features

Transparency

One of the most important features of a prediction market is transparency which Tronel has because itâ€™s implemented on the Tron smart contracts.

Design

We do research about the behaviors of users in centralized prediction networks and we design the project in a way that gives users the best experience.

User Experience

We care about optimization and performance and simplicity so that users have a better connection with this market.

Without Third Parties

In Tronel every user is able to predict the cryptocurrencies directly and without any servers or third parties.

Challenge with others all around the world and invite your friends to this game!



Development roadmap

April 19, 2019

Whitepaper Release

We published the whitepaper officially

June 30, 2019

Beta Version

We will publish the beta version of the application and we will look forward to getting feedback from the community to fix the bugs and enhancements.

August 1, 2019

Lunch App

The v1.0 will be published and it will be open source

Help us build a new world on the Tron platform.
